item.title: First post
item.author: (Willem Sleegers)
item.description: This is the first post of my new website, created with the amazing blogdown. Blogdown uses R and Hugo to create a website with blogging functionality. There are various themes to choose from, and this website uses a customized version of the internet-weblog theme. If you’re interested in the code for this website, let me know!
